title: New Miscrits in Miscrian Jungle
intro: This version brings 4 New Miscrits to the Jungle, hurry up and catch them all!

sections.name: Blug
sections.quote: Blug's wings are very fragile and can be damaged by even the slightest touch, so it rarely spreads them

sections.name: Dark Humbug
sections.quote: Dark Humbug's serrated beak is horribly, painfully sharp. It's so thin that it can reach through anywhere you try to hide

sections.name: Kawanko
sections.quote: Kawanko is the male counterpart to Bunaken that inhabits the eastern seas of Miscria. Fishermen describe him as a playful creature, often spotted along riverbanks where his lively nature can be observed

sections.name: Casanova
sections.quote: No one can resist the charms of Casanova. Everyone that crosses his path eventually ends up falling in love
